name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Network Engineer with exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, specializing in network architecture and troubleshooting. Proven expertise in managing and optimizing network performance for complex infrastructures, including proficiency with **TCP/IP**, **BGP**, **OSPF**, **EIGRP**, **VLANs**, **VPNs**, **firewalls**, **proxies**, and **load balancers**. Experienced in implementing and maintaining **SD-WAN** solutions, ensuring seamless connectivity and efficient data flow. 

Leveraging over 13 years of full stack development experience, skilled in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. Adept at building high-performance applications in both frontend and backend environments using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Knowledgeable in cloud-native deployments on **AWS** and **Azure**, as well as integrating AI/ML capabilities for enhanced network operations. Committed to compliance-driven development with understanding of industry standards.
